org.opends.server.replication.service

Class ReplicationDomain.IEContext

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.opends.server.replication.service.ReplicationDomain.IEContext
  • Enclosing class:
    ReplicationDomain

    protected class ReplicationDomain.IEContext
extends java.lang.Object
    This class contain the context related to an import or export launched on the domain.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors

      ReplicationDomain.IEContext(boolean importInProgress)
      Creates a new IEContext.

    • Constructor Detail

      • ReplicationDomain.IEContext

        public ReplicationDomain.IEContext(boolean importInProgress)
        Creates a new IEContext.
        Parameters:
        importInProgress - true if the IEContext will be used for and import, false if the IEContext will be used for and export.

    • Method Detail

      • updateCounters

        public void updateCounters(int entriesDone)
                    throws DirectoryException
        Update the counters of the task for each entry processed during an import or export.
        Parameters:
        entriesDone - The number of entries that were processed since the last time this method was called.
        Throws:
        DirectoryException - if an error occurred.

      • setAckVal

        public void setAckVal(int serverId,
             int numAck)
        Set the id of the EntryMsg acknowledged from a receiver (importer)server. (updated via the listener thread)
        Parameters:
        serverId - serverId of the acknowledger/receiver/importer server.
        numAck - id of the message received.

      • getSlowestServer

        public int getSlowestServer()
        Returns the serverId of the server that acknowledged the smallest EntryMsg id.
        Returns:
        serverId of the server with latest acknowledge. 0 when no ack has been received yet.
